# Welcome! {.unnumbered}

These are the course notes for . In many cases they are incomplete as this course
and the [`socmod`](https://css4s.github.io/socmod) library are being actively developed. Still, this seems worthwhile
even if it's an active work-in-progress.

If you have suggestions, questions, want to report typos, etc., please help me out 
and [open an issue](https://github.com/CSS4S/notes/issues) on the repo's github page.
